articles.content: Xiaomi's Redmi 12 5G becomes top-selling 5G smartphone on Amazon India's debut day, with 3 lakh units of the Redmi 12 series sold overall. Priced from Rs 11,999 to Rs 15,499, the phone features a 6.7… [+2017 chars]

articles.author: Shaurya Sharma
articles.title: Apple Watch X To Offer Major Redesign, Offer Magnetic Bands: Report - News18
articles.description: Apple could be working on a new Apple ‘Watch X’ to mark the tenth anniversary of the Apple Watch. Here's what it could offer.
articles.content: The Apple Watch was first introduced in 2015, and Apple has released a new model every year since then. As we approach Apples September eventwhere the company is expected to unveil the Apple Watch Se… [+1667 chars]
